Case_ID.description: Unique identifier for a patient case.

Tumor/Normal.description: Indicates whether the sample is from tumor tissue, normal tissue, or both.

Age.description: Age of the patient in years at the time of diagnosis or sample collection.

BMI.description: Body Mass Index (BMI) of the patient, calculated as weight in kilograms divided by the square of height in meters.

Race.description: The self-reported or observed racial category of the patient, reflecting broad social and cultural groups.
enum: Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander

Ethnicity_Self_Identify.description: The self-identified ethnicity of the patient, typically distinguishing between Hispanic/Latino and Non-Hispanic/Latino origins.

Tumor_Site.description: The general anatomical location of the primary tumor within an organ or body region.

Tumor_Site_Other.description: Free-text description providing additional details for tumor sites not covered by predefined categories in 'Tumor_Site'.

Tumor_Size_cm.description: The maximum dimension of the tumor measured in centimeters.

Tumor_Focality.description: Indicates whether a tumor is single (unifocal) or multiple (multifocal) within an organ.

Histologic_Type.description: Specifies the microscopic classification or subtype of the tumor tissue.

Grade.description: Pathological grade of the tumor, indicating its degree of differentiation and aggressiveness (e.g., Fuhrman grade for renal cell carcinoma).

Tumor_Stage_Pathological.description: Pathological stage of the tumor, typically based on the overall TNM system, indicating the extent of cancer progression.

Path_Stage_Primary_Tumor_pT.description: Pathological T (primary tumor) stage component of the TNM classification system, describing the size and extent of the primary tumor.

Path_Stage_Reg_Lymph_Nodes_pN.description: Pathological stage for regional lymph nodes (pN stage) based on the TNM classification system, indicating the extent of cancer spread to regional lymph nodes.
